text:
I've configured Apache 1.3.19 to use mod_jk (tomcat 3.2.1) and mod_xslt (xalan 
1.1), but when both shared libraries are being used Apache will not come up! 
Starting Apache with either mod_jk or mod_xslt works as expected.
creator: r.bakens@wxs.nl
marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text: This won't make it into 3.2.2 but will be evaluated for a later release.
